name: Zirconia - The Mysterious Planet
description:
An NES inspired space adventure with strange alien races and robots!

From shmup to platforming, you'll always be occupied by hostile aliens. 

  • WASD/arrow keys - move, enter door, climb
  • K/Z - interact, jump, confirm
  • J/X - cancel, attack
  • Enter  - start, pause
  • Shift - select
